title: Greek lentil soup
ingredients: ['200g dry lentils, rinsed and drained', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped, or to taste', '125g sliced celery', '60g sliced carrots', '2 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '400g tomato passata', '45g chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
